original_title: The Fabricated Partner of Cody McGuire
overview: Cody McGuire has just returned from an important doctor’s appointment, only to find an attractive-but-naïve artificially created man on her doorstep named Mr. Perfect. With the help of her best friend Jocelyn Christmas, Cody will have to find Mr. Perfect a new home before he drives her insane.
title: The Fabricated Partner of Cody McGuire
